Index >  IfShowFileDialog

IfShowFileDialog

Description

Returns or sets whether to show open/save file dialog when saving scanned images or loading images from a local directory.

Data type

bool

Default value

true

Syntax

.IfShowFileDialog = true;

Remarks

The default value of the IfShowFileDialog property is true.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

LoadImage
LoadImageEx
SaveAllAsMultiPageTIFF
SaveAllAsPDF
SaveAsBMP
SaveAsJPEG
SaveAsPDF
SaveAsPNG
SaveAsTIFF
SaveSelectedImagesAsMultiPagePDF
SaveSelectedImagesAsMultiPageTIFF
